This website is for a textbook entitled Introduction to the Mathematics of Computer Graphics that has been published by the Mathematical Association of America.

  • You can buy the ebook online.

This website is a collection of links and resources useful to my students and to other readers, both students and instructors.  I aim for it to evolve and improve for the foreseeable future.  Current resources are grouped as follows.

  • Download the software packages used in the text
  • Resources for each chapter
  • Resources for each POV Break
